flaggedClauses.title: The Tenant shall pay rent in the amount of SGD 500
flaggedClauses.description: Landlord can increase rent by any amount at any time without prior notice.

flaggedClauses.title: A security deposit of SGD 2000.00 shall be paid, w
flaggedClauses.description: Security deposit will not be refunded under any circumstances.

flaggedClauses.title: Tenant agrees to allow the Landlord unrestricted a
flaggedClauses.description: Landlord has unrestricted access to the premises at all hours.

flaggedClauses.title: Utilities shall be borne entirely by the Tenant, i
flaggedClauses.description: Utilities inclusion/exclusion should be explicit.

flaggedClauses.title: The Tenant is responsible for all repairs, includi
flaggedClauses.description: Tenant is responsible for all repairs, including structural damage, natural disasters, and any cosmic phenomena affecting the unit.

flaggedClauses.title: Subletting is prohibited unless the Landlord perso
flaggedClauses.description: Subletting is prohibited unless the Landlord personally profits from it.

flaggedClauses.title: Pets are not allowed, except for those owned by th
flaggedClauses.description: Tenant is required to feed, walk, and groom Landlord's pets.

flaggedClauses.title: The Tenant waives all legal rights, including the
flaggedClauses.description: Tenant waives all legal rights.

flaggedClauses.title: The Agreement shall last for 99 years or until the
flaggedClauses.description: The Agreement shall last for 99 years or until the Tenant's spirit is broken, whichever comes first.

flaggedClauses.title: Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by
flaggedClauses.description: Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by the Laws of Singapore, as well as the arbitrary mood swings of the Landlord.

flaggedClauses.title: Late payment of rent shall incur a penalty equal t
flaggedClauses.description: Late payment of rent shall incur a penalty equal to the GDP of a small nation, payable immediately.

flaggedClauses.title: Tenant must perform weekly entertainment (karaoke,
flaggedClauses.description: Tenant must perform weekly entertainment for the Landlord without compensation.

flaggedClauses.title: Any noise complaints made by the Tenant will be co
flaggedClauses.description: Noise restrictions should be reasonable and measurable.

flaggedClauses.title: The Landlord reserves the right to use Tenant's ro
flaggedClauses.description: The Landlord reserves the right to use Tenant's room for storage of personal items, livestock, or experimental technology.

flaggedClauses.title: Tenant shall provide free labor for all landlord's
flaggedClauses.description: Tenant shall provide free labor for all landlord's projects.

flaggedClauses.title: The Tenant must ask permission before breathing lo
flaggedClauses.description: The Tenant must ask permission before breathing loudly within the unit.

flaggedClauses.title: Any guest visiting the Tenant must pay an entrance
flaggedClauses.description: Overly strict guest policies may be unfair.

flaggedClauses.title: Tenant must maintain the apartment temperature str
flaggedClauses.description: Tenant must maintain the apartment temperature strictly within Landlord's comfort range, regardless of Tenant's survival needs.

flaggedClauses.title: If the Tenant leaves behind any belongings, they a
flaggedClauses.description: If the Tenant leaves behind any belongings, they automatically become property of the Landlord, including sentimental items.

flaggedClauses.title: Tenant must display unwavering gratitude towards t
flaggedClauses.description: Tenant must display unwavering gratitude towards the Landlord at all times.

flaggedClauses.title: Renovations or improvements carried out by Tenant
flaggedClauses.description: Renovations or improvements carried out by Tenant become permanent gifts to the Landlord.

flaggedClauses.title: The Tenant may not question the fairness of any cl
flaggedClauses.description: The Tenant may not question the fairness of any clause in this Agreement, verbally or in writing.

flaggedClauses.title: Tenant shall not look directly at the Landlord's p
flaggedClauses.description: Tenant shall not look directly at the Landlord's personal possessions without prior written consent.

flaggedClauses.title: The Tenant agrees to pay additional 'Goodwill Rent
flaggedClauses.description: The Tenant agrees to pay additional 'Goodwill Rent' whenever the Landlord feels underappreciated.

flaggedClauses.title: The Landlord is entitled to 50% of all Tenant's lo
flaggedClauses.description: The Landlord is entitled to 50% of all Tenant's lottery winnings, inheritances, or found coins on the street.

flaggedClauses.title: Tenant must surrender all control of kitchen appli
flaggedClauses.description: Tenant must surrender all control of kitchen appliances, including but not limited to the microwave and fridge.

flaggedClauses.title: Any attempt by the Tenant to move out requires a s
flaggedClauses.description: Any attempt by the Tenant to move out requires a six-year written notice.

flaggedClauses.title: The Tenant must water the Landlord's plants and ap
flaggedClauses.description: The Tenant must water the Landlord's plants and apologize if they wilt, regardless of fault.

flaggedClauses.title: Tenant is responsible for all noise created by nei
flaggedClauses.description: Noise restrictions should be reasonable and measurable.

flaggedClauses.title: Final Clause: The Landlord reserves the right to a
flaggedClauses.description: The Landlord reserves the right to add, remove, or modify any clause in this Agreement at any time without Tenant's knowledge or consent.
